Dead by Daylight is another one of those love hate relationship games for me. 

I main Killer, and thus my gameplay is either me doing insanely well, and being told I am toxic and should kill myself for not playing by the survivors made up rules, or I get destroyed and T-bagged into oblivion,

I absolutely love this game and its concept, and if you have friends to play with, I 100% recommend it. It goes on sale pretty often too!
Great game for friends and solo

Great concept fleshed out into a great game, the first few hours play like a real horror but after playing for long enough it becomes a lot more competitive than it was probably meant to be, constantly updated and whilst everyone will drop the pretty good job so far meme when something goes wrong the devs work fairly rapid to fix bugs and harder still to keep the game fresh. Dead by Daylight is a game I've been able to play ever since I've gotten it regularly and has main game potential if you really enjoy its playstyle, downsides are not the greatest optimization, I'd reccomend anyone not running a strong rig to stick to lower settings. The community also has its toxic side like any other, however this one is a lot more outspoken, killer players will often feel like they're being harassed if they don't follow survivours made up rules, and whilst as a killer you should try to stick to a couple (tunneling for example is just the least fun experience you can have in this game) you shouldn't feel like you have to bend to their will everytime you load in, but they won't make it feel like that.

Great game though definitely worth a go no matter what genre you prefer, might just find your newest favourite game
It has many bugs and balance issues but all in all it is an enjoyable game

7/10

Very fun game, i get a kick out of playing both survivors and killers. Being able to survive with your friends is a great time. The addition of the rift challenges (like a battle pass) helps give me something to work towards so there is never a dull moment.
You might think doing the same thing over and over would get boring, this game for some reason just isn't.  I have fun playing it, even after 1000+ hours.
